EmailTemplate.name: Account manager change over
EmailTemplate.subject: This email is to notify that you are getting a new Account Manager!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Introducing Your New Account Manager!
Hello {!Account.Name}
This email is to notify you that there will be an account manager change over for your site. We hope that all of your queries relating to your ATM service were answered.
We would like to introduce {!Account.OwnerFullName} as your new account manager. If you have any questions, you can reach out to them on: Phone: {!Account.OwnerPhone} Email: {!Account.OwnerEmail}
Should you require any further assistance please use the details below or contact your account manager directly. Technical Support: 1800 301 100 Sales enquiries: 1300 305 600 Email: sales@cardtronics.com.au Website: www.cardtronics.com.au Technical issues can be logged online via Customer Care
Here’s to the start of a great working relationship!
The Cardtronics Team.
Copyright © 2021 Cardtronics, an NCR company, All rights reserved. You are viewing this email because you are a contact of the Cardtronics business. Our mailing address is: 87 Corporate Drive Heatherton VIC 3202
